job_purpose: To tackle complex challenges and drive meaningful change through data-driven solutions
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Building and deploying machine learning models at scale
Designing data pipelines and infrastructure for AI systems
Conducting cutting-edge research in NLP, computer vision, or generative AI
Using big data to generate actionable business insights
Collaborating across teams to embed intelligence into real-world products
required_qualifications: Strong expertise in Python, SQL, and relevant data/ML frameworks
Experience with large-scale datasets and cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Curious mindset and drive to innovate
Ability to communicate complex technical ideas to non-technical stakeholders
company_details: A large global company offering services in consulting, technology, and operations to help businesses grow and improve. The company supports clients in becoming more efficient and successful through new technology and smart ideas.
